title: Excited toddler discovers his shadow for the first time
title_page: Excited toddler discovers his shadow for the first time | Daily Mail Online
text:
A cute video has emerged of a toddler playing with his shadow as he notices it for the first time.
The footage, shot at a home in Philadelphia, PA, USA last week, shows the two-year-old twisting around in front of a wall, trying to hide in the corner.
When he realises that the shape in front of him is mimicking him he decides to see how far he can push it.
The footage, shot at a home in Philadelphia, PA, USA last week, shows the two-year-old twisting around in front of a wall, trying to hide in the corner
He runs furiously on the spot, as though he is trying to race it, before unleashing a series of blows against the wall.
But it is a fight that the youngster almost loses, stumbling backwards before giving the camera a mischievous look.
He then continues on his fun and the video ends.
